languages.text: {n}Панель перед вами покрыта техническими рунами, огоньками {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}люменов{/g} и рычагами. Площадка дрожит от могучей вибрации котла. Железный зверь под вашими ногами норовисто рычит и свирепо фыркает раскаленным паром.{/n}

{n}The panel before you is covered with technical runes, {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumens{/g}, and levers. The platform shakes with the boiler's mighty vibration as the iron beast beneath your feet growls and snorts ferociously.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Панель перед вами покрыта техническими рунами, огоньками {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}люменов{/g} и рычагами. Площадка дрожит от могучей вибрации котла. Железный зверь под вашими ногами норовисто рычит и свирепо фыркает раскаленным паром.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The panel before you is covered with technical runes, lumens, and levers. The platform shakes with the boiler's mighty vibration. The iron beast under your feet is growling and snorting ferociously.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El panel que hay frente a ti está cubierto de runas técnicas, {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumens{/g} y palancas. La plataforma tiembla con la poderosa vibración de la caldera mientras la bestia de hierro bajo tus pies gruñe y resopla con ferocidad.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The panel before you is covered with technical runes, {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumens{/g}, and levers. The platform shakes with the boiler's mighty vibration as the iron beast beneath your feet growls and snorts ferociously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El panel que hay frente a ti está cubierto de runas técnicas, {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumens{/g} y palancas. La plataforma tiembla con la poderosa vibración de la caldera mientras la bestia de hierro bajo tus pies gruñe y resopla con ferocidad.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの前のパネルは、機械ルーン、{g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}ルーメン{/g}、そしてレバーでいっぱいだった。ボイラーの力強い振動でプラットフォームが揺れた。足下の鉄の獣が獰猛にうなり、鼻を鳴らしたせいだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The panel before you is covered with technical runes, {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumens{/g}, and levers. The platform shakes with the boiler's mighty vibration as the iron beast beneath your feet growls and snorts ferociously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの前のパネルは、機械ルーン、{g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}ルーメン{/g}、そしてレバーでいっぱいだった。ボイラーの力強い振動でプラットフォームが揺れた。足下の鉄の獣が獰猛にうなり、鼻を鳴らしたせいだった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你面前的控制面板上布满了技术符文、{g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}流明灯{/g}与各种拉杆。当你脚下的钢铁巨兽凶猛地咆哮时，你脚下的平台也在随着锅炉的轰响而震动。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The panel before you is covered with technical runes, {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumens{/g}, and levers. The platform shakes with the boiler's mighty vibration as the iron beast beneath your feet growls and snorts ferociously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你面前的控制面板上布满了技术符文、{g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}流明灯{/g}与各种拉杆。当你脚下的钢铁巨兽凶猛地咆哮时，你脚下的平台也在随着锅炉的轰响而震动。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das Bedienfeld vor dir ist bedeckt mit technischen Runen, {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}Lumen{/g} und Hebeln. Die Plattform erzittert durch die mächtige Vibration des Heizkessels, als die Eisenbestie unter deinen Füßen wild knurrt und schnaubt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The panel before you is covered with technical runes, {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumens{/g}, and levers. The platform shakes with the boiler's mighty vibration as the iron beast beneath your feet growls and snorts ferociously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Bedienfeld vor dir ist bedeckt mit technischen Runen, {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}Lumen{/g} und Hebeln. Die Plattform erzittert durch die mächtige Vibration des Heizkessels, als die Eisenbestie unter deinen Füßen wild knurrt und schnaubt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le panneau devant vous est couvert de runes techniques, de {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumens{/g} et de leviers en tout genre. La plateforme tremble au diapason des fortes vibrations émises par la chaudière alors que le monstre d'acier gronde et renâcle furieusement sous vos pieds.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The panel before you is covered with technical runes, {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumens{/g}, and levers. The platform shakes with the boiler's mighty vibration as the iron beast beneath your feet growls and snorts ferociously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le panneau devant vous est couvert de runes techniques, de {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumens{/g} et de leviers en tout genre. La plateforme tremble au diapason des fortes vibrations émises par la chaudière alors que le monstre d'acier gronde et renâcle furieusement sous vos pieds.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Önünde duran paneli teknik rünler, {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lümenler{/g} ve kollarla kaplamış. Ayaklarının altındaki demirden canavar şiddetle gürüldeyip homurdanırken platform da kazanın kudretli titreşimiyle sarsılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The panel before you is covered with technical runes, {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumens{/g}, and levers. The platform shakes with the boiler's mighty vibration as the iron beast beneath your feet growls and snorts ferociously.{/n}
